projects.name: University Calendar Generator
projects.description: Scrapes the University of Utah's academic calendar website and dynamically generates an iCal file, based on user selection. Adheres to TDD and SOLID code principles.

projects.name: EliParker.dev
projects.description: 3-D portfolio website that showcases my projects and skills. Showcases skill in React Three Fiber and React Three Drei, as well as React best practices.

projects.name: Galaxy Generator
projects.description: Three-js project that uses particles and visual algorithms to generate an interactive three-dimensional galaxy.

projects.name: Text Generation Algorithm
projects.description:
Java program that dynamically generates text based on a given input text. Based on Markov Chains. 
 (Code is available to employers upon request)

projects.name: React Site
projects.description: This website! Built with React. Showcases understanding of modern web dev practices including component-based architecture, state management with hooks, and responsive design.

projects.name: Spreadsheet
projects.description:
Spreadsheet web app which works similar to Excel. Composed of robust and test-driven C# class libaries and an intuitive blazor GUI. Developed at the U of U with my partner! 
 (Code is available to employers upon request)
